definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
to leave/to bid farewell to/to say good-bye to

sentences.english: You neednt worry, my little treasure.
Don't eat up at one and you can have it after a while.
sentences.chinese: 别一下子全吃了，留一点过会儿再吃。

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 请叫那男孩别在房间里乱碰乱撞。

sentences.english: B： Don't worry. You will meet nice people that will help you.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，你会遇到贵人相助。

sentences.english: Don’t worry about mother, I’ll cover for you this time.
sentences.chinese: 别担心妈妈那边，这一次我会为你掩护的。

sentences.english: Don't make any noise while the baby is sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 孩子睡觉时别发出任何声音。

sentences.english: Don't push me, or I will break your neck.
sentences.chinese: 别欺人太甚，否则我拧断你的脖子。

sentences.english: You do not so serious to me, I'm afraid I will betray you.
sentences.chinese: 请你别对我那么认真，只怕我会背叛你。
那就别再说什么死亡了。

sentences.english: Don't blame me for the delay.
Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 别推下来，但使用面对身体来驱动头向前。

sentences.english: Don't cut your finger on the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 别让碎玻璃割伤你的手。

sentences.english: I'd never leave you until I die.
Althogh I tried to pursuade him to stop smoking, he still could not make his mind.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我尽力劝他别抽烟了，他还是下不了决心。

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 别对我说好听的，我要见你的行动。

sentences.english: Don't let them jerk you around.
sentences.chinese: 别让他们对你指手划脚的。

definition: contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
so as not to/so as to avoid
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
need not/does not have to/not necessarily
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
